name: AS_GCM_BL_statusFilterForClauseSetRecord
description: Returns status filter for clause sets
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!refData: rule!AS_GCM_UT_filterRefDataForSelection(
    refData: rule!AS_GCM_QR_getRefData(
      refTypes: cons!AS_GCM_REF_TYPE_CLAUSE_SET_STATUS
    ),
    refType: cons!AS_GCM_REF_TYPE_CLAUSE_SET_STATUS
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordFilterList"(
    name: "",
    options: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: local!refData,
      expression: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordFilterListOption"(
        id: fv!item.refDataId,
        name: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
          bundle: ri!bundle,
          bundleKey: fv!item.refKey
        ),
        filter: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: ri!filterField,
          operator: "=",
          value: fv!item.refDataId
        )
      )
    ),
    allowMultipleSelections: true
  )
)
